name: Warforged Soldier
book: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.Warforged Resilience: The warforged has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned and is immune to disease. Magic can't put it to sleep.

actions.Multiattack: The warforged makes two armblade attacks.
actions.Armblade: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.Javelin: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
